name: Mighty Buildings
headline: 3D printing beautiful, high-quality, and sustainable homes.
description:
Mighty Buildings is an innovative construction technology company based in Oakland, CA creating beautiful, sustainable, and high-quality homes using 3d-printing, robotics, and automation. Their mission is to have a positive impact on the environment, local communities, and the housing crisis through their sustainable approach.

Mighty Buildings' technology has the potential to unlock the needed productivity for large scale construction alongside the opportunity for reduced emissions, leading to a more sustainable product and future. Mighty Buildings was founded by a team of physicists and robotics engineers with extensive experience solving hard R&D problems and building successful engineering firms. They started by inventing a new material that is a 3D printing tech that enabled printing of an entire building, not just walls, in a single cycle. Unlike concrete, Mighty Buildings’ material is lighter, can be uniquely treated (trimmed and cut) by robotic arms, and features high thermal insulation properties. This allows them to produce prefab housing with up to 80% of operations automated.

Mighty Buildings has a near-zero waste production process, preventing 1,100 - 2,000 kg of CO2 emission per 3D-printed home. They are committed to achieving Net-Zero by 2028 - making the company 22 years ahead of the construction industry.

The company is certified under California's Factory Built Housing program to build units using 3D-printing, but they are also the first company to achieve certification under the UL 3401 standard for evaluating building structures and assemblies.

founders.name: Slava Solonitsyn
founders.description: Slava is an accomplished investor, and entrepreneur (top YC company Mighty Buildings - W18, Socap.ai - W23). At Mighty Buildings, he commercialized the 3D printing tech that enabled the printing of an entire building, not just walls, in a single cycle, to address the dearth of affordable housing in Silicon Valley, California, and the rest of the world. Now he is focused on helping founders & investors to grow their network and fundraise better with a new YC company Socap.ai

founders.name: Dmitry Starodubtsev
founders.description: Dmitry Starodubtsev is a serial entrepreneur, inventor, and technologist that has developed over 50 new products including 20 US and international patents. Dmitry is also CTO and co-founder of Mighty Buildings, a construction technology company creating beautiful, affordable, and sustainable homes using 3D printing and robotic automation. Mighty Buildings is backed by reputable VCs such as Khosla Ventures, Bold Capital, and Y Combinator.

# Introducing the world's most complete 3D printed exterior wall system
# Introducing the most complete 3D printed wall system
## Reduce costs with speed, quality, and performance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e30e8fad3f0315c245851b/66ec85371f9fad248a5072a4_20231214_074126-web.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e30e8fad3f0315c245851b/66ec7a7763276b21c1afa91e_icon_fewer%20trades.png)
##### **Fewer trades**
Install a finished exterior wall with a crew of four
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e30e8fad3f0315c245851b/66ec7a81364b9f487fa9cbc8_icon_speed.png)
##### **Undeniable Speed**
Complete wall assembly in as little as three days
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e30e8fad3f0315c245851b/66ec7a91785ac755fe270a85_icon_performance.png)
##### **High Performance**
The most tested and certified new building material in the market
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e30e8fad3f0315c245851b/66ec7a9cc2fcee41e9ebaed6_icon_resilience.png)
##### **Proven Resilience**
Fire, Wind, and Seismic tested in compliance with international certifications
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e30e8fad3f0315c245851b/66ec7aa2294373f4392602cd_icon_sustainability.png)
##### **Dedicated Sustainability**
Committed to carbon neutrality
## Mighty Kit System™
‍
The Mighty Kit System™ is a factory-made complete wall system that brings the fastest, most resilient envelope to a building. We offer two innovative products to meet a wide range of building types, designs, and market conditions.
#### MKS**®** 2.0
Connecting to the strength and dependability of a superstructure, this system can adapt to any design regardless of size and finishes with seamless integration and state-of-the-art custom textures.
#### MKS**®** BASE
Without the need for a superstructure, this load bearing panel is easily adopted at scale for residential construction, setting the bar for cost-saving, easy-to-assemble shell construction
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e30e8fad3f0315c245851b/66e4bdcf0bac6c9427e27c95_Rectangle-563.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e30e8fad3f0315c245851b/66f728a3f2cf943df6800de2_mks%20base.jpg)
[View products](https://www.mightybuildings.com/</mighty-kit-system>)
## Our latest project
###### Site Office in Dubai, UAE
Innovative construction site office in collaboration with leading developer in UAE that features parametric designs.‍
[Explore more projects](https://www.mightybuildings.com/</projects>)

You don't need to choose between speed, quality, design and protecting the planet. Together we can build a better future for the construction industry and the environment.

generated_description:
Mighty Buildings is a trailblazing construction tech company, based in Oakland, CA, that’s shaking up the housing industry using 3D printing and automation. Founded in 2017, as part of Y Combinator's W18 batch, their mission is straightforward: create beautiful, high-quality homes while having a positive impact on the environment and addressing the ongoing housing crisis. 

The genius behind Mighty Buildings comes from a diverse team of physicists and robotics engineers who tackled tough R&D hurdles before venturing into construction. They developed an innovative material that allows for the 3D printing of entire buildings in a single go—a game-changer when compared to traditional concrete approaches. This material is not just lightweight; it can be finely manipulated by robotic arms and boasts excellent thermal properties, making it ideal for prefab housing.

Their production process is strikingly efficient, generating near-zero waste and preventing up to 2,000 kg of CO2 emissions for each home they build. Mighty Buildings is committed to achieving Net-Zero by 2028, which puts them way ahead of their competitors in the construction sector.

Currently, they’re certified under California's Factory Built Housing program and notably, they were the first to achieve UL 3401 certification for their building structures. With approximately 200 employees and their Group Partner Nan, they are making waves in the fields of robotics, construction, and 3D printing.

Mighty Buildings has rolled out their "Mighty Homes" for sale, particularly in Desert Hot Springs, CA. Their latest offering includes the Mighty Kit System™, which is a complete wall system designed to accelerate building speed and enhance resilience against external forces like fire, wind, and earthquakes.

Beyond just building, they’re actively involved in shaping a sustainable future. It’s evident they believe in fusion—where robust design, modern tech, and environmental responsibility coexist, providing better homes for people and a cleaner planet.

If you’d like to explore further, you can visit their website at [Mighty Buildings](https://www.mightybuildings.com) and stay updated through their social media channels. They're definitely a company to keep an eye on as they push the boundaries of construction technology.
